dmca.title: Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing Activity
dmca.body:
From: "MediaAntipiracy01" <Internet1@Publishers-Antipiracy.net> 
To: <blogger@trakken.com>, <legal-support@google.com>, <support@blogger.com> 
Date: Tue, 17 Apr 2007 19:45:27 +0100 
Local: Tues, Apr 17 2007 11:45 am 
Subject: Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing Activity 
Attachments: PGPexch.htm.pgp   

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA256

VIA EMAIL: 

Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity 

Date: 17 April 2007 
Case #: 4412 
URL: http://dl51.blogspot.com/2007/04/alan-simpsons-windows-vista-bible.html, 

Dear Sir or Madam, 

We have received information that the domain listed above, which appears to be on servers under your control, is offering unlicensed copies of, or is engaged in other unauthorized activities relating to copyrighted works published by, John Wiley & Sons, Inc.

1. Identification of copyrighted work(s): 

Copyrighted work(s): 
Alan Simpson's Windows Vista Bible (ISBN: 0470040300) 

Copyright owner or exclusive licencee: 
John Wiley & Sons, Inc. 

2. Copyright infringing material or activity found at the following location(s): http://dl51.blogspot.com/2007/04/alan-simpsons-windows-vista-bible.html, 

The above copyrighted work(s) is being made available for copying, through downloading, at the above location without authorization of the copyright owner(s) or exclusive licensee.

3. Statement of authority: 

The information in this notice is accurate, and I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., the owner or exclusive licensee of the copyright(s) in the work(s) identified above. I have a good faith belief that none of the materials or activities listed above have been authorized by, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., its agents, or the law.

We hereby give notice of these activities to you and request that you take expeditious action to remove or disable access to the material described above, and thereby prevent the illegal reproduction and distribution of this copyrighted work(s) via your company's network. 

We appreciate your cooperation in this matter. Please advise us regarding what actions you take. 

Yours sincerely, 

Peter Anaman 
Internet Investigator 

on behalf of: 

John Wiley & Sons, Inc. 
111 River Street, Mail Stop 3-05 
Hoboken, NJ 07030 
United States of America 

E-mail: internet1@publishers-antipiracy.net
